content: **knitted jumper in drops daisy or drops lima piece is knitted top down with raglan cables relief pattern and double neck edge size s - xxxl** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern da-019 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops daisy from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 550-600-650-750-800-900 g colour 02 marzipan or use drops lima from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 600-650-750-800-900-950 g colour 0206 wheat **needles** drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 and 80 cm drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 and 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 4 mm drops double pointed needles size 3 mm drops cable needle the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 21 stitches in width and 28 row vertically in stocking stitch on needle size 4 mm = 10 x 10 cm note remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles
